title: Handle Suite Holder Special Request
description: A season suite holder calls to request a special birthday cake be delivered to their suite during the next game.

tasks.description: Verify the caller is the authorized contact for the suite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the caller's identity against the suite account.

tasks.description: Take the details of the request (cake flavor, message, delivery time).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the special request.

tasks.description: Place a special order with the catering department for the birthday cake.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the order and adds the charge to the suite's account.

tasks.description: Confirm the order details back to the suite holder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a confirmation email to the client.
